entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main protagonist of the story. He is mentioned as having practiced non-verbal spells with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron Weasley is Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as having practiced non-verbal spells with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione Granger is Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts. She is mentioned as having practiced non-verbal spells with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Rubeus Hagrid is the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher at Hogwarts. He has stopped coming to meals and seems distant.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Filius Flitwick is a teacher at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as needing practice with the Aguamenti charm.

entities.name: skrewts
entities.description: Skrewts are creatures that Hagrid teaches in his Care of Magical Creatures class. Ron mentions having had a narrow escape from them.

relationships.description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione practiced non-verbal spells together.
